lines.text: read from the input to t
while t ! = 0 , decrement it and continue the loop
create long longs s , a , b and c
lines.code: long long s , a , b , c ;

lines.text: read variables s , a , b and c from the input
offers is a new long long called = s / ( a * c )
lines.code: long long offers = s / ( a * c ) ;

lines.text: remaining is a new unsigned integer variable with value s % ( a * c )
lines.code: unsigned int remaining = s % ( a * c ) ;

lines.text: set offers to ( offers * a ) + ( offers * b )
if remaining > = c , increase offers by ( remaining / c )
lines.code: if ( remaining >= c ) offers += ( remaining / c ) ;
